argSrc: One can hardly move in Friedrichshain or Neukölln these days without permanently scanning the ground for dog dirt.
argTrg: And when bad luck does strike and you step into one of the many 'land mines' you have to painstakingly scrape the remains off your soles.

argSrc: One can hardly move in Friedrichshain or Neukölln these days without permanently scanning the ground for dog dirt.
argTrg: Higher fines are therefore the right measure against negligent, lazy or simply thoughtless dog owners.

argSrc: One can hardly move in Friedrichshain or Neukölln these days without permanently scanning the ground for dog dirt.
argTrg: Of course, first they'd actually need to be caught in the act by public order officers,

argSrc: One can hardly move in Friedrichshain or Neukölln these days without permanently scanning the ground for dog dirt.
argTrg: but once they have to dig into their pockets, their laziness will sure vanish!
